snippet: The oil giant has about 7 percent of global liquefied natural gas production, and wants to more than double that with new investments and acquisitions.
abstract: Royal Dutch Shell is betting its future on business of bringing natural gas from remote locations like Qatar to energy-hungry destinations like China and Japan; company has about 7 percent of world's liquified natural gas business, with ambitions to more than double that share through new projects and acquisitions.
lead_paragraph: The oil giant has about 7 percent of global liquefied natural gas production, and wants to more than double that with new investments and acquisitions.

headline.seo: Shell Makes Big Bet on Boom in Natural Gas
headline.main: Shell Makes Big Bet on Boom in Natural Gas
headline.print_headline: Shell Makes a Heavy Bet On a Boom in Natural Gas
